org.magnos.service
Class AbstractService<E>

java.lang.Object
  org.magnos.service.Service<E>
      org.magnos.service.AbstractService<E>
Type Parameters:
E - The event added to the service. Events added to the service are handled in the service's thread by invoking the onServiceEvent method in all attached listeners.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, EventHandler<E>, ServiceListener<E>, org.magnos.util.Sleepable
public abstract class AbstractService<E>
extends Service<E>
implements ServiceListener<E>

An abstract implementation of a Service which also listens to its own events.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

onServiceEvent

public final void onServiceEvent(Service<E> service,
                                 E event)
The method invoked when the service is handling an event. This method executes concurrently in the service's thread. This method is invoked in the beginning of a servicing iteration, before execution.

Specified by:
onServiceEvent in interface ServiceListener<E>
Parameters:
service - The service invoking this listener.
event - The event being handled.

onServiceExecute

public final void onServiceExecute(Service<E> service)
The method invoked after the service has handled all events in the current servicing iteration. This may not be called if the service is being shut down immediately.

Specified by:
onServiceExecute in interface ServiceListener<E>
Parameters:
service - The service invoking this listener.

onServicePause

public final void onServicePause(Service<E> service,
                                 ServiceInterrupt interrupt)
The method invoked when the service has successfully paused. The next method invoked in the listener will either be stop or resume.

Specified by:
onServicePause in interface ServiceListener<E>
Parameters:
service - The service invoking this listener.
interrupt - The interrupt type given to pause the service.

onServiceResume

public final void onServiceResume(Service<E> service,
                                  ServiceInterrupt interrupt)
The method invoked when the service has successfully resumed. The method previously invoked can only be pause.

Specified by:
onServiceResume in interface ServiceListener<E>
Parameters:
service - The service invoking this listener.
interrupt - The interrupt type given to pause the service.

onServiceStart

public final void onServiceStart(Service<E> service)
The method invoked when the service thread has started and is about to begin its servicing iterations. This method is only called once per time the service is started (a service can only be started if its not running at all).

Specified by:
onServiceStart in interface ServiceListener<E>
Parameters:
service - The service invoking this listener.

onServiceStop

public final void onServiceStop(Service<E> service,
                                ServiceInterrupt interrupt)
The method invoked when the service has successfully stopped.

Specified by:
onServiceStop in interface ServiceListener<E>
Parameters:
service - The service invoking this listener.
interrupt - The interrupt type given to stop the service.
